testcase.classname: Verify Login Functionality with mobile number and OTP
testcase.name: Verify Login with Mobile Number and OTP
testcase.system-out: Given Validate the chrome browser...........................................passed Given User must be on slider page...........................................passed Then User click on Slider icon..............................................passed When user enters the Mobile Number as 1010101010 mobile number..............passed Then User clicks on Continue button.........................................passed When user enters the otp as 111111 OTP......................................passed Then User clicks on Submit button...........................................passed

testcase.classname: Verify Create Group and User functionality
testcase.name: Verify user is able to create group
testcase.system-out: Given User must be logged in with Corporate Customer........................passed Then User clicks on Manage groups Module....................................passed Then User clicks on create group icon.......................................passed When user enters the GroupName as qaaq Group name...........................passed When user enters the Description as TestAutomation description..............passed Then User clicks on Next button.............................................passed Then user select Fleet Manager..............................................passed Then User clicks on Next button.............................................passed Then User select Fleet vehicle..............................................passed Then User click on CreateGroup button and verify success message............passed

testcase.classname: Verify Create Group and User functionality
testcase.name: Verify user is able to create Drive
testcase.system-out: Then User clicks on Users Module............................................passed Then User clicks on user create group icon.................................passed Then User Select Role and click on OK button................................passed When user enters the FullName as TestG Fullname.............................passed When user enters the MobileNo as 2030451074 MobileNo........................passed When user enters the Email as testouee@yopmail.com Email....................passed Then User click on CreateUser button and verify success message.............passed Then closes the browser.....................................................passed
